name: Fortnite VBucks
description:
Do you love Fortnite ? Are you a big fan of Fortnite ? Do you search for fortnite V-Bucks ? And aspiring to get more VBucks ?

You're in the right place, Fortnite VBucks will guide you to know a lot of things about Fortnite & V-Bucks !

V-Bucks, short for Vindertech Bucks or Vinderbucks, are an in-game currency (fortnite). They are used for purchasing items from the in-game Vindertech Store in Save the World, or to purchase cosmetic items from the Item Shop and the Battle Pass in Battle Royale.

We made this App for Fortnite fans, in order to facilitate explain all about Fortnite Vbucks .

You will find inside it :
- What is Fortnite?
- Weapon
- Map
- All Outfits & Skins
- VBucks

Every page guides you to things you maybe was not knowing them before in fortnite !!!
